content: this pattern is now free thank you so much to everyone who purchased it - you raised a total of £1350 for cancer reaearch you are all awesome last year dan went through chemotherapy and during that process he wasn t able to knit one evening we sat and talked about his favourite knitted item and discussed the outline of what has become this pattern we wanted to create something that could be knit for guys as well as girls and would be the perfect tv or car knitting project we hope that people will knit this for friends going through chemo or gift it to a knitting friend who has been touched by this terrible illness the cowl is knit in the round using just knit and purl stitches so is perfect for beginners and expert knitters alike within the pattern are links to tutorials along with a special edition bakery bears podcast this is only accessible through this pattern purchase thank you all so much
